channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Middle East turmoil: Funeral ceremonies for Iran's president
item.description: Iran elections have been set for June 28 following the death of President Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash. Follow for live updates.

item.title: 1 dead amid 'severe' turbulence on Singapore Airlines flight, carrier says
item.description: The Singapore Airlines flight was traveling from London to Singapore.

item.title: May 20, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Biden administration denounced efforts by the International Criminal Court to seek arrest warrants for top Israeli officials and Hamas leaders, saying the court's efforts put the terrorist organization and a top US ally on equivalent footing.

item.title: Trump posts social media clip seemingly suggesting a win will bring 'unified Reich'
item.description: Former President Donald Trump on Monday posted a video on his social media platform that uses language that appears to mirror that of Nazi Germany.

item.title: Dramatic day in court as defense begins to present case in Trump trial
item.description: Defense witness Robert Costello, a lawyer who advised Michael Cohen, is expected to resume his testimony Tuesday in Donald Trump's New York criminal hush money trial.

item.title: As 3 states recover from 13 tornadoes, more severe weather on the way
item.description: As emergency crews in three states began mopping up and assessing damage from a series of tornadoes on Sunday, more severe weather is on the way.

item.title: Iran's President Raisi killed in helicopter crash
item.description: Iran's President Ebrahim Raisi has died in a helicopter crash, the government has confirmed. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Star golfer's arraignment postponed after arrest during PGA Championship
item.description: Star golfer Scottie Scheffler faces four charges, including second-degree assault of a police officer -- a felony. His arraignment has been postponed until June 3.

item.title: May 19, 2024 helicopter crash involving Iranian president
item.description: A helicopter carrying Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi crashed while he was visiting a northern region in the country Sunday, according to the Iranian state news agency IRNA.

item.title: Hearing to determine if Missouri man who has been in prison for 33 years was wrongfully convicted
item.description: Christopher Dunn has spent 33 years in prison for a murder in Missouri he has always claimed he didnâ€™t commit
